casebody.data:
COSTA v. WARDEN OF THE MARYLAND HOUSE OF CORRECTION [App. No. 88,

September Term, 1964.]

Decided February 5, 1965.

Before Prescott, C. J., and Hammond, Horney, Marbury, Sybert, Oppenheimer and Barnes, JJ.

*639Per Curiam.

For the reasons stated by Judge Pugh in his opinion below, the application for relief must be denied.

Application denied.
